short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: from Google check Fake news against mediabiasfactcheck.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides context menu items that allow a user to check news bias of links and images. For example on Facebook, you can easily determine what type of left or right-leaning bias a site has, as logged by mediabiascheck.com.
